system_description: ContosoShop – React SPA front-end with REST API in Azure App Service + SQL back-end + Service Bus for transaction decoupling.
issue_summary: Product images intermittently fail to load on the main product listing page.

conversation_history.message: Hi, we've noticed that some product images aren't loading for users on the main shop page. It doesn't happen all the time but seems to affect random products each visit.
Thank you for reporting the issue, Jordan. Can you confirm if this is affecting all browsers or specific ones, and whether it happens on both desktop and mobile?
It looks like it happens in both Chrome and Edge, and we've had reports from users on both desktop and mobile devices.
Understood. We are currently investigating the image load failures and will provide an update as soon as we identify the root cause.
